name: format-erb
description: Format ERB using the htmlbeautifier gem

format-erb.commandPath.description: Path to the htmlbeautify command.  Set this to an absolute path to select from multiple installed Ruby versions.

format-erb.useBundler.description: Use `bundle exec` to run htmlbeautify. (If this is true, the format-erb.commandPath setting is ignored.)

format-erb.bundlerPath.description: Path to the bundle executable, defaults to 'bundle'. Needs to be an absolute path for the 'bundle' exec/shim

format-erb.tabStops.description: Set number of spaces per indent (default 2)

format-erb.indentBy.description: Indent the output by NUMBER steps (default 0)

format-erb.stopOnErrors.description: Stop when invalid nesting is encountered in the input

format-erb.keepBlankLines.description: Set number of consecutive blank lines (default 0)

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
